arts.ttl: Wednesday's Transfer Talk Update: Joshua Zirkzee, Wojciech Szczesny, Marc-Andre ter Stegen
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up the latest confirmed transfer news and speculation from across the footballing world.

arts.ttl: De Jong blown away by Barca fans after return from injury
arts.sum: Frenkie de Jong admitted he was blown away by Barcelona fans after receiving a standing ovation on his return to action after injury. “I’m very happy with the victory and personally to be back on the pitch, to play football, and also for the applause from the fans.

arts.ttl: Barcelona 5-0 Young Boys: Player ratings as Blaugrana dominate in routine win
arts.sum: While Hansi Flick's side were heavy favourites heading into the game, they made sure to flex every ounce of their quality in a sublime performance which saw Robert Lewandowski, Raphinha and Inigo Martinez all get on the score sheet in the first half. Young Boys' best chance of the evening came as Joel Monteiro crashed against the woodwork from close range, before Marc Casado was needed to clear the rebound off the line.

arts.ttl: Flick gives his verdict after Barca hammer Young Boys
arts.sum: It was a strong performance from the Catalan giants, but Flick still saw room for improvement for his team after the game. Hansi Flick saw his Barcelona team get back to winning ways on Tuesday with a comprehensive 5-0 win over Young Boys in the Champions League .

arts.ttl: Barcelona secure youngster's future with crucial contract adjustment
arts.sum: Barcelona have agreed a new contract with home-grown midfielder Marc Bernal that will serve to raise the teenager's release clause to an eye-watering amount. But Lionel Messi's release clause never made it that high, peaking at €700m when he signed a new four-year contract in 2017 – less than a month before PSG snatched Neymar – which proved to be his last at Camp Nou.

arts.ttl: Sidelined Barcelona star responds to 5-goal drubbing of Young Boys
arts.sum: A sidelined member of the first-team ranks at La Liga giants Barcelona has on Tuesday night provided his response to the club’s latest dominant victory. Barcelona of course marked their…

arts.ttl: ‘That’s what’s really changed for me’ - Raphinha talks stellar Barca form
arts.sum: “We knew we had to respond to the game in Monaco. The Brazilian spoke out after the Champions League win

arts.ttl: De Jong makes return in Barca rout of Young Boys
arts.sum: Frenkie de Jong made his long-awaited return to Barcelona on Tuesday after being sidelined for nearly five months because of an ankle injury.

arts.ttl: Barcelona star Iñigo speaks out on injury scare
arts.sum: Barcelona star Iñigo Martínez has late on Tuesday provided an update on his wellbeing. This comes after the defender set pulses racing across the Barcelona fanbase, during the club’s latest…

arts.ttl: Barcelona 5-0 Young Boys: Highlights, man of the match, stats
arts.sum: Free-scoring Barcelona produce a commanding performance to record their first Champions League victory of the season with a 5-0 home win against Young Boys.
